name: Individual Physician or Medical Doctor
description: Provider offering diagnosis and treatment of medical conditions
covered_if: Transmits health information in electronic form in connection with a healthcare transaction

name: Dental Care Provider
description: Provider offering preventive and restorative dental services
covered_if: Maintains and transmits health information (dental records) in electronic form

name: Vision Care Provider
description: Provider offering eye exams and vision correction services
covered_if: Transmits records electronically or bills electronically for covered services

name: Foot Care Specialist
description: Provider offering treatment of foot and ankle conditions
covered_if: Maintains patient medical records and transmits electronically

name: Advanced Practice Nurse
description: Provider offering primary care and specialty nursing services
covered_if: Holds provider credentials and transmits health information electronically

name: Physician Assistant
description: Healthcare provider working under physician supervision
covered_if: Practices under a physician's oversight and transmits health information

name: Chiropractic Care Provider
description: Provider offering spinal manipulation and alignment services
covered_if: May be covered if transmits health information electronically or bills for healthcare

name: Psychiatrist or Psychologist
description: Provider offering mental health and psychiatric services
covered_if: Maintains patient mental health records and may transmit electronically

name: Physical Medicine Provider
description: Provider offering rehabilitation and physical therapy services
covered_if: Maintains therapy records and transmits for healthcare transactions

name: Home-Based Care Provider
description: Organization providing healthcare services in patient residences
covered_if: Transmits health information electronically in healthcare transactions
